about: The Vesper is a potent cocktail made famous by James Bond in the novel Casino Royale. It consists of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blonde, shaken and strained into a chilled cocktail glass and garnished with a lemon twist.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

about: The Bacardi cocktail is a simple yet refreshing drink made with Bacardi White Rum, lime juice, and grenadine syrup. It's shaken with ice cubes and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Negroni is a classic Italian cocktail known for its bittersweet flavor profile. It's made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet red vermouth, served over ice in an old-fashioned glass with a half orange slice garnish.
instructions: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

about: The Rose cocktail is a delightful blend of kirsch, dry vermouth, and a hint of sweetness from strawberry syrup. It's stirred with ice and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

about: The Old Fashioned is a classic cocktail that dates back to the 19th century. It's made by muddling sugar with bitters and water, adding whiskey (typically bourbon or rye), and garnishing with an orange slice and cherry.
instructions: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

about: The Tuxedo is a classic cocktail that blends Old Tom Gin, dry vermouth, maraschino, absinthe, and orange bitters. It's stirred with ice and strained into a cocktail glass, then garnished with a cherry and a lemon twist.
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

about: The Mojito is a refreshing Cuban cocktail made with white rum, lime juice, mint, sugar, and soda water. It's served over ice in a Collins glass and garnished with mint leaves and a lemon slice.
instructions: Muddle mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

about: The Horse's Neck is a simple and refreshing long drink made with cognac, ginger ale, and optional dashes of Angostura bitters. It's served over ice in a highball glass with a lemon twist garnish.
instructions: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

about: Planter's Punch is a tropical cocktail made with dark rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, grenadine syrup, sugar syrup, and a few dashes of Angostura bitters. It's poured into a large glass filled with ice and topped with Angostura bitters, garnished with a pineapple slice and a cherry.
instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, 'on top'.

about: The Sea Breeze is a refreshing long drink made with vodka, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice. It's built directly in a highball glass filled with ice and garnished with a lime wedge.
instructions: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

about: The Pisco Sour is a classic Peruvian cocktail made with pisco, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and a raw egg white. It's shaken and strained into a chilled old-fashioned glass and garnished with a dash of Angostura bitters.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

about: The Long Island Iced Tea is a potent cocktail made with tequila, vodka, white rum, triple sec, gin, lemon juice, gomme syrup, and a dash of cola. It's served in a highball glass filled with ice and garnished with a lemon twist.
instructions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

about: The Clover Club is a classic cocktail made with gin, raspberry syrup, lemon juice, and a few drops of egg white. It's shaken with ice cubes and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

about: The Angel Face is a smooth cocktail made with gin, apricot brandy, and calvados. It's shaken with ice cubes and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

about: The Mimosa is a classic sparkling cocktail made with champagne and orange juice. It's poured into a champagne flute, gently stirred, and optionally garnished with an orange twist.
instructions: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: Buck's Fizz is a very similar cocktail but made of two parts champagne to one part orange juice.

about: The Whiskey Sour is a classic cocktail made with bourbon whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar syrup. It's shaken with ice cubes, strained into a cocktail glass, and optionally garnished with half an orange slice and a cherry.
instructions: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

about: The Screwdriver is a simple and refreshing cocktail made with vodka and orange juice. It's built directly in a highball glass filled with ice and garnished with an orange slice.
instructions: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

about: The Cuba Libre is a classic long drink made with white rum, cola, and lime juice. It's built directly in a highball glass filled with ice and garnished with a lime wedge.
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

about: The Manhattan is a classic cocktail made with rye whiskey, red vermouth, and a dash of Angostura Bitters. It's stirred with ice cubes and strained into a chilled cocktail glass, garnished with a cherry.
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Porto Flip is a rich and creamy after-dinner cocktail made with cognac, red port, and an egg yolk. It's shaken with ice cubes, strained into a cocktail glass, and garnished with fresh ground nutmeg.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

about: The Gin Fizz is a classic long drink made with gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and soda water. It's shaken with ice cubes (except for soda water), poured into a tumbler, and topped with soda water, garnished with a lemon slice.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

about: The Espresso Martini is a sophisticated after-dinner cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur, sugar syrup, and a shot of espresso. It's shaken with ice cubes and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Margarita is a classic cocktail made with tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. It's shaken with ice cubes, strained into a cocktail glass rimmed with salt, and optionally garnished with lime slices.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

about: The French 75 is a classic sparkling cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and champagne. It's shaken with ice cubes (except for champagne), strained into a champagne flute, and topped up with champagne, gently stirred.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

about: The Yellow Bird is a tropical cocktail made with white rum, Galliano, triple sec, and lime juice. It's shaken with ice cubes and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Piña Colada is a tropical cocktail made with white rum, pineapple juice, and coconut milk. It's blended with ice and served in a large goblet or Hurricane glass, garnished with a pineapple slice and a cherry.
instructions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

about: Aviation is a classic cocktail made with gin, maraschino cherry liqueur, and lemon juice. It's shaken and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: Bellini is a delightful sparkling cocktail made with Prosecco and peach puree. It's perfect for celebrations and gatherings, offering a refreshing taste.
instructions: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

about: Grasshopper is a creamy after-dinner cocktail made with white Créme de Cacao, green Créme de Menthe, and cream. It's shaken with ice and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: Tequila Sunrise is a vibrant long drink featuring tequila, orange juice, and grenadine syrup. Its layered appearance resembles a sunrise, making it visually stunning.
instructions: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

about: Daiquiri is a classic before-dinner cocktail featuring white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. It's shaken with ice and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

about: Rusty Nail is a robust after-dinner cocktail featuring Scotch whisky and Drambuie. It's served over ice in an old-fashioned glass.
instructions: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: B52 is a layered after-dinner cocktail featuring Kahlúa, Baileys Irish Cream, and Grand Marnier. It's served in a shot glass and often enjoyed flaming.
instructions: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on the side plate.

about: Stinger is a classic after-dinner cocktail featuring cognac and white Créme de Menthe. It's stirred with ice and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

about: Golden Dream is a creamy after-dinner cocktail featuring Galliano, triple sec, orange juice, and cream. It's shaken with ice and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: God Mother is a simple after-dinner cocktail featuring vodka and DiSaronno. It's served over ice in an old-fashioned glass.
instructions: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: Spritz Veneziano is a refreshing sparkling cocktail featuring Prosecco, Aperol, and a splash of soda water. It's garnished with half an orange slice.
instructions: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

about: Bramble is a delightful all-day cocktail featuring gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and blackberry liqueur. It's served over crushed ice and garnished with a lemon slice and two blackberries.
instructions: Build over crushed ice in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

about: Alexander is a creamy cocktail featuring cognac, brown Créme de Cacao, and cream. It's shaken and strained into a chilled cocktail glass, then garnished with fresh ground nutmeg.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

about: Lemon Drop Martini is a zesty all-day cocktail featuring citron vodka, triple sec, and lemon juice. It's served in a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and garnished with a lemon slice.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

about: French Martini is a fruity cocktail featuring vodka, raspberry liqueur, and pineapple juice. It's shaken with ice and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: Black Russian is a classic after-dinner cocktail made with vodka and coffee liqueur. It's served over ice and stirred gently.
instructions: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: Bloody Mary is a classic long drink made with vodka, tomato juice, and a variety of savory spices. It's typically garnished with celery and served over ice.
instructions: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into a highball glass.

about: Mai-tai is a refreshing tropical long drink featuring white and dark rum, orange curaçao, orgeat syrup, and lime juice. It's garnished with a pineapple spear, mint leaves, and a lime wedge.
instructions: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a straw.

about: Barracuda is a delightful sparkling cocktail made with dark rum, Galliano, pineapple juice, lime juice, and a splash of Prosecco.
instructions: Combine all ingredients except Prosecco. Top with Prosecco.

about: Sex on the Beach is a fruity long drink made with vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice. It's typically garnished with an orange slice.
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

about: The Monkey Gland is a classic cocktail featuring gin and orange juice, with a hint of absinthe and grenadine for complexity. It is shaken and strained into a chilled cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Derby cocktail is a refreshing mix of gin with peach bitters and fresh mint leaves, served in a martini glass and garnished with mint leaves.
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

about: The Sidecar is a classic cocktail made with cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice. It is shaken with ice and strained into a cocktail glass.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

about: The Irish Coffee is a classic hot drink made with Irish whiskey, hot coffee, and cream, sweetened with brown sugar. It is a comforting and indulgent beverage, perfect for chilly days or evenings.
instructions: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

about: The Sazerac is a classic after-dinner cocktail that originated in New Orleans. It is made with cognac, absinthe, sugar cube, and Peychaud’s bitters, and garnished with a lemon twist.
instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass.

about: The Americano is a classic before-dinner cocktail that features Campari, red vermouth, and a splash of soda water. It is served over ice in an old-fashioned glass with half an orange slice.
instructions: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.

about: The Singapore Sling is a classic long drink that combines gin, cherry liqueur, Cointreau, DOM Bénédictine, pineapple juice, lime juice, grenadine syrup, and a dash of Angostura bitters. It is shaken with ice and strained into a highball glass, garnished with a pineapple slice and a cherry.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.

about: The French Connection is a simple yet sophisticated cocktail made with equal parts cognac and DiSaronno, served over ice in an old-fashioned glass.
instructions: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: The Moscow Mule is a refreshing and tangy cocktail made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice. It is served over ice in a highball glass with a lime slice garnish.
instructions: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.

about: The John Collins is a classic long drink made with gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and soda water. It is served over ice in a highball glass with a lemon slice and cherry garnish.
instructions: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

about: The Kir is a classic before-dinner cocktail made with dry white wine and Créme de Cassis. It is a simple yet elegant drink that originated in France.
instructions: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

about: The Mint Julep is a classic long drink made with bourbon whiskey, fresh mint, sugar, and water. It is a refreshing and aromatic cocktail, perfect for warm weather.
instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar, and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.

about: Tommy's Margarita is a variation of the classic Margarita cocktail, made with tequila, lime juice, and agave nectar instead of triple sec. It is a simple and refreshing drink with a perfect balance of sweet and sour flavors.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Paradise cocktail is a delightful blend of gin, apricot brandy, and orange juice. It is a bright and fruity drink with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Dirty Martini is a classic cocktail made with vodka, dry vermouth, and olive juice. It is a savory and briny drink with a subtle herbal note.
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.

about: The Champagne Cocktail is a classic sparkling cocktail made with champagne, cognac, Angostura bitters, and a sugar cube. It is an elegant and festive drink, perfect for celebrations and special occasions.
instructions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.

about: The Mary Pickford is a classic cocktail made with white rum, cherry liqueur, pineapple juice, and grenadine syrup. It is a sweet and fruity drink with a tropical flair.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

about: The Hemingway Special is a classic cocktail made with white rum, grapefruit juice, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice. It is a tart and refreshing drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

about: The Dark 'n' Stormy is a classic long drink made with dark rum and ginger beer. It is a bold and flavorful cocktail with a spicy kick. Garnish with a lime wedge
instructions: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.

about: The Ramos Fizz is a classic long drink made with gin, citrus juices, sugar syrup, cream, egg white, and soda water. It is a creamy and frothy cocktail with a hint of citrus and floral notes.
instructions: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

about: The Russian Spring Punch is a sparkling cocktail made with vodka, lemon juice, Créme de Cassis, and sugar syrup, topped with sparkling wine. It is a refreshing and fruity drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.

about: The God Father is a classic cocktail made with Scotch whisky and DiSaronno amaretto. It is a simple yet sophisticated drink with a rich and nutty flavor.
instructions: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: The Cosmopolitan is a classic all-day cocktail made with citron vodka, Cointreau, lime juice, and cranberry juice. It is a refreshing and tart drink with a vibrant pink color.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

about: The Dry Martini is a classic before-dinner cocktail made with gin and dry vermouth. It is a sophisticated and timeless drink with a perfect balance of botanical and herbal flavors.
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

about: Between the Sheets is a classic all-day cocktail made with white rum, cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice. It is a strong yet refreshing drink with a citrusy kick.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Casino is a classic all-day cocktail made with Old Tom Gin, maraschino liqueur, orange bitters, and lemon juice. It is a sophisticated and aromatic drink with a hint of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Caipirinha is a classic all-day cocktail made with cachaca, fresh lime, and sugar. It is a simple and refreshing drink with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

about: The Vampiro is a bold and spicy highball made with silver tequila, tomato juice, orange juice, lime juice, honey, onion, chili peppers, Worcestershire sauce, and salt. It is a vibrant and flavorful drink with a spicy kick.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.

about: The Kamikaze is a classic all-day cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, and lime juice. It is a strong and tart drink with a citrusy kick.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The White Lady is a classic all-day cocktail made with gin, triple sec, and lemon juice. It is a crisp and refreshing drink with a citrusy twist.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.

about: The Harvey Wallbanger is a classic all-day cocktail made with vodka, Galliano, and orange juice. It is a fruity and refreshing drink with a hint of herbal sweetness.
instructions: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.

about: The Bee's Knees is a classic cocktail made with gin, honey syrup, and lemon juice. It is a refreshing and citrusy drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Boulevardier is a classic cocktail made with bourbon, sweet vermouth, and Campari. It is a bold and bitter drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Stir with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

about: The Brandy Crusta is a classic cocktail made with brandy, maraschino liqueur, lemon juice, and sugar. It is a sophisticated and citrusy drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass with a sugared rim.

about: The Canchanchara is a classic cocktail originating from Cuba, made with rum, honey, and lime. It is a simple yet refreshing drink with a balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Muddle lime and honey in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and stir well. Fill with ice cubes.

about: The Corpse Reviver #2 is a classic cocktail made with gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice. It is a light and refreshing drink with a citrusy flavor.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Fernandito is a classic cocktail made with rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, and mint leaves. It is a refreshing and tropical drink with a minty flavor.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar syrup in a highball glass. Fill with crushed ice. Add rum and lime juice. Stir gently.

about: The Hanky Panky is a classic cocktail made with gin, sweet vermouth, and Fernet-Branca. It is a bold and complex drink with a bitter and herbal flavor.
instructions: Stir with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Last Word is a classic cocktail made with gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice. It is a complex and herbal drink with a balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Martinez is a classic cocktail made with gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and orange bitters. It is a smooth and flavorful drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Stir with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

about: The Naked & Famous is a modern cocktail made with mezcal, Aperol, yellow Chartreuse, and lime juice. It is a bold and smoky drink with a hint of sweetness and bitterness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The New York Sour is a classic cocktail made with bourbon, lemon juice, sugar syrup, and red wine. It is a rich and flavorful drink with a tart and fruity finish.
instructions: Pour the whiskey, syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top. Garnish with lemon or orange zest and cherry.

about: The Old Cuban is a modern cocktail made with aged rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, Angostura bitters, and sparkling wine. It is a sophisticated and bubbly drink with a balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, and bitters with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with sparkling wine.

about: The Paloma is a classic cocktail made with tequila, grapefruit soda, lime juice, and salt. It is a refreshing and citrusy drink with a hint of sweetness and a salty finish.
instructions: Build into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: The Paper Plane is a modern cocktail made with bourbon, Aperol, Amaro Nonino, and lemon juice. It is a bold and bitter drink with a hint of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Penicillin is a modern cocktail made with blended Scotch whisky, Islay single malt Scotch whisky, honey syrup, and lemon juice. It is a smoky and warming drink with a balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Shake blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Float Islay single malt Scotch whisky on top.

about: The Spicy Fifty is a modern cocktail made with tequila, elderflower liqueur, lime juice, and jalapeño pepper. It is a spicy and refreshing drink with a balance of sweetness and tartness.
instructions: Muddle jalapeño pepper in a shaker. Add tequila, elderflower liqueur, and lime juice. Shake with ice cubes. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Suffering Bastard is a classic cocktail made with gin, bourbon, lime juice, ginger beer, and Angostura bitters. It is a bold and flavorful drink with a spicy and citrusy kick.
instructions: Build into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

about: The Tipperary is a classic cocktail made with Irish whiskey, sweet vermouth, and green Chartreuse. It is a smooth and herbal drink with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Stir with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: The Trinidad Sour is a modern cocktail made with Angostura bitters, rye whiskey, orgeat syrup, and lemon juice. It is a bold and aromatic drink with a balance of bitterness and sweetness.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

about: Ve.N.To is a cocktail featuring grappa as its base spirit. It is served on the rocks, poured over ice, and garnished with lemon zest and white grapes.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.

ingredient.name: Honey Mix (made with chamomile infusion if desired)

about: The Zombie is a classic cocktail made with rum, falernum, grenadine, lime juice, absinthe, and various fruit juices. It is a strong and fruity drink with a complex flavor profile.
instructions: Shake with crushed ice. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with mint sprig.
